about_the_game:
The soundtrack to the game "Watch Me Jump", with 19 tracks of original music from Jeremy Gable (and one public domain marching band song!)

All files are in mp3 format.

1). L-L-L-L-Ladies and Gentlemen - 0:16
2). Tutoriel - 0:40
3). Welcome to the Repose - 1:07
4). Knock Knock Knock - 0:12
5). Not an Attack - 1:59
6). Russkiy - 0:31
7). Go, Bulldogs! (Washington & Lee Swing) - 0:33
8). Scandal (Not the Show) - 1:34
9). Now You've Done It - 1:35
10). Tanya's Here - 0:35
11). Offer on the Table - 1:07
12). That Rock Song Your Friend Likes - 0:51
13). Requiem for a Friendship - 1:39
14). Welcome to the Repose (Quarter 3) - 1:15
15). Not My Best Workout - 2:11
16). Race Cars or Muffins - 1:12
17). Welcome to the Repose (Quarter 4) - 2:11
18). A Note From the Author - 1:53
19). Credits - 1:02
20). L-L-L-L-Ladies and Gentlemen (Announcement Trailer) - 0:35
